hero_tagline: No ads. No noise. Just real baking intelligence.
hero_title: Precision Dough Engineering for Home Bakers and Professionals
hero_subtitle: Stop guessing. Start mastering your dough with science-based calculations, guided workflows and a personal dough laboratory that evolves with you.
value_props_calc_desc: Professional-grade hydration, salt, fermentation and temperature modeling.
value_props_mylab_desc: Track batches, analyze patterns, store results, evolve your style.
value_props_levain_desc: The smart sourdough companion: feed tracking, health monitoring and growth insights.
value_props_improve_desc: New styles, new techniques, new tools — updated continuously.
comparison_subtitle: Choose the right level of precision for your craft.
mission_p1: DoughLabPro is a tool built for serious bakers who demand precision. We removed the guesswork to provide a modern approach to fermentation, hydration, and thermal dynamics.
mission_p2: We bridge the gap between home baking and professional standards. No fluff, no cooking clichés — strictly technical credibility for those who treat baking as a science.
demo_calc_desc: Structure, proportion, technique. Design dough like an engineer.
demo_mylab_desc: The most complete personal dough journal ever made.
demo_levain_desc: The first smart sourdough companion built for modern bakers.
demo_library_desc: A growing technical database of international dough styles.
affiliate_subtitle: These are the tools and ingredients we actually use and recommend. Some links are affiliate links — at no extra cost to you.
faq_q1: What is the difference between Free and Pro?
faq_a1: Free gives you the essential calculator and basic logging. Pro unlocks the full laboratory: unlimited data, AI diagnostics, advanced fermentation tracking, and cloud sync.
faq_q2: Why is the app so technical?
faq_a2: Precision requires detail. We treat dough as a biochemical system. Variables like temperature, protein content, and friction factor matter for consistent results.
faq_a3: DoughLabPro is a tool to build and execute recipes, not a cookbook. We provide technical presets for styles, but you are the engineer of the final formula.
faq_a4: Yes. Your MyLab data is yours. We do not sell your recipes or usage data to third parties.
faq_a5: Absolutely. Management is done directly through your app store subscription settings.
faq_q6: Does it support metric and imperial?
faq_a6: Yes. The calculator converts seamlessly between Grams, Kilograms, Ounces and Pounds, though we strongly recommend metric for precision.
faq_a7: It is a dedicated module to track the microbiome health of your starter based on feeding ratios, temperature, and rise times.
